Wairoa: Town that introduced NZ’s first Māori ward doesn’t seem bothered by it https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/wairoa-town-that-introduced-nzs-first-maori-ward-doesnt-seem-bothered-by-it/LELWWMGWVBA7RDWVQET2AVWERI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/wairoa-town-that-introduced-nzs-first-maori-ward-doesnt-seem-bothered-by-it/LELWWMGWVBA7RDWVQET2AVWERI/ Doug LaingJust two people made submissions about the under-review ward, both in favour. Wed, 09 Oct 2024 21:06:27 +0000 Wairoa, where the district council favours a continuation of the general and Māori wards structure that was introduced in 2019. The current decision is appealable, with an October 31 deadline for objections. Photo / NZME
Is HMNZS Manawanui leaking? Conflicting reports from NZ and Samoa https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/is-hmnzs-manawanui-leaking-conflicting-reports-from-nz-and-samoa/ABV2FG7FCJFE3OMJWVSBZRVUDM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/is-hmnzs-manawanui-leaking-conflicting-reports-from-nz-and-samoa/ABV2FG7FCJFE3OMJWVSBZRVUDM/ The Navy says there are no fuel leaks, Samoan officials says there are. Wed, 09 Oct 2024 21:04:41 +0000 A photo of HMNZS Manawanui, taken by one of the rescuers on Saturday night off the coast of Upolu, Samoa. Trevor Meredith was one of four men on a rescue boat that got 10 of the 75-strong crew back to safety. Photo / Trevor Meredith
